Tonya Harding threatened to walk out of an interview with Piers Morgan after the Good Morning Britain host implied that the former ice skater is using the film I, Tonya to “ play the victim ” and questioned her involvement with in the attack on her rival Nancy Kerrigan. On the show to discuss the movie starring Margot Robbie, Harding grew visibly frustrated as Morgan began implying that the film victimized her, rather than Kerrigan, whom Morgan believed was the true victim. “ Maybe it suits you to play the victim, ” Morgan told Harding. “ But I think the victim in all this wasn ’ t you.
